short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a Second Opinion by Grok.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Second Opinion Extension helps you get instant Second Opinions on ChatGPT responses. Using Grok's truth-seeking AI, it analyzes ChatGPT's outputs to identify potential inaccuracies, biases, or missing context.

Key Features:
• Second Opinion: Click on any ChatGPT response to get a Second Opinion by Grok
• Topic Detection: Customizable topics to highlight content that matters to you
• Save & Share: Bookmark Second Opinions and share insights on X

How It Works:
• Install the extension and sign in with and sync your Google account (only works on Google Chrome)
• Chat with ChatGPT as usual
• Click on any highlighted text to get a Second Opinion by Grok
• Save or share important Second Opinions for future reference

Note: This extension requires a Grok API key for full functionality. Get your API key at docs.x.ai/docs
